jobDescription: OVERVIEW OF THE COMPANYJOB DESCRIPTION The Customer Intelligence group at 20th Century Fox designs, builds and operates machine learning pipelines that analyze several data sources to explain and predict the dynamics of filmed entertainment, theatrical movie releases and home entertainment consumption.  We are looking for a resourceful and motivated individual to drive strategically important and visible machine learning projects with our internal and external technology partners in the areas of natural language analysis, social media analysis, and chatbot analysis.  The person in this role will be in charge of defining and managing overall program goals and key individual milestones; coordinating with key stakeholders; cleaning and transforming large quantities of continuously streaming data; applying ML models to the data; pushing ML insights to management dashboards and/or decision making tools; and implementing end-to-end, production-ready machine learning pipelines. We will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable law.SDL2017
